description: I am facing several mental issues, like I am feeling depressed as I am seeing the darkest part of the world, and everywhere I look, all I see is injustice and cruelty.
I am facing several mental issues, like I am feeling depressed as I am seeing the darkest part of the world, and everywhere I look, all I see is injustice and cruelty.
Experiencing chest pain and shortness of breath. Feeling very anxious about the symptoms.
Frequent headaches and dizziness. Struggling to focus and maintain balance.
Severe skin rashes and itching. The condition is worsening despite using over-the-counter creams.
Knee pain and swelling after a recent fall. Difficulty walking and climbing stairs.
Irregular menstrual cycles and severe cramps. Seeking advice on possible underlying issues.
Persistent stomach pain and digestive issues. Concerned about a potential ulcer.
Child experiencing frequent fevers and coughing. Worried about possible infections.
Frequent urination and discomfort. Suspecting a possible urinary tract infection.
Blurred vision and eye strain. Difficulty reading and working on the computer.
Constant ringing in the ears and hearing loss. Seeking treatment for tinnitus.
Struggling with anxiety and panic attacks. Looking for therapy options.
Unexplained weight gain and fatigue. Concerned about thyroid issues.
Lump detected in breast during self-examination. Seeking further evaluation and tests.
Swollen ankles and high blood pressure. Worried about kidney function.
Joint pain and stiffness, especially in the morning. Suspecting arthritis.
Shortness of breath and persistent cough. Concerned about lung health.
Frequent bruising and fatigue. Worried about blood disorders.
Tingling and numbness in hands and feet. Suspecting nerve damage.
